about_the_game:
This is a free DLC which contains all The Last Tree soundtracks. Note that all soundtracks used in this game are public domain, and this DLC gives you a free download access to them.

The DLC includes followin tracks:
0. Chopin, Noctrune Op. 27 No. 2 - D Flat Major
1. Yuliya Lebedenko, Adagio - G Minor
2. Mondschein
3. Suite I, No. 2 in F major, HWV 427 - I. Adagio
4. Funeral March, Op. posth. 72 no. 2
5. Piano Concerto in A Minor, Op. 16 - II. Adagio
6. Antonio Vivaldi - Concerto in B flat Major - V. Largo
7. Scenes from Childhood, Op. 15 - I. Of Foreign Lands And Peoples
8. Gymnopédie No. 1 [Guitar arr.]-0-Accou - Erik Satie - Gymnopedie No.1
9. LaMer 01, De laube a midi sur la mer
10. Debussy
11. LaMer 02, Jeux de vagues
12. LaMer 03, Dialogue du vent et de la mer
13. Peer Gynt Suite No. 1 Op. 46 I Morning
14. Peer Gynt Suite 6 II Aases Death
15. Grieg Edvard - Cello Sonata, A Minor, Op.36 - II. Andante molto tranquillo b
16. Lytic Pieces, No. 4 Op. 54 Notturno
17. Prelude in G Sharp Minor Op.32 No.12
18. Etudes Tableaux, Op. 39 - Apassianato
19. Rachmaninoff Prelude No. 4 Op. 23
20. Major Jeremy Ng Prelude - E Flat Op. 23
22. Preludes, Book 2 - La puerta del Vin
23. In My Homeland
24. Drommesyn - Phantom
25. Piano Concerto No. 2 in C Minor, Op. 18 - I. Moderato
26. Gnossienne
27. Prelude in G Major, No. 5 Op. 32
28. Pandora Selfridge Claude Debussys lisle joyeuse
29. Liszt - Simon Barere - I. La leggierezza
30. Liszt - Simon Barere - II. Petrarch Sonnet No.104
31. Liszt - Simon Barere - III. Gnomenreigen
32. Liszt - Simon Barere - IV. Reminiscences de Don Juan - Mozart
33. Etude No. 12 Op. 10 (Revolutionary)
detailed_description:
This is a free DLC which contains all The Last Tree soundtracks. Note that all soundtracks used in this game are public domain, and this DLC gives you a free download access to them.

The DLC includes followin tracks:
0. Chopin, Noctrune Op. 27 No. 2 - D Flat Major
1. Yuliya Lebedenko, Adagio - G Minor
2. Mondschein
3. Suite I, No. 2 in F major, HWV 427 - I. Adagio
4. Funeral March, Op. posth. 72 no. 2
5. Piano Concerto in A Minor, Op. 16 - II. Adagio
6. Antonio Vivaldi - Concerto in B flat Major - V. Largo
7. Scenes from Childhood, Op. 15 - I. Of Foreign Lands And Peoples
8. Gymnopédie No. 1 [Guitar arr.]-0-Accou - Erik Satie - Gymnopedie No.1
9. LaMer 01, De laube a midi sur la mer

18. Etudes Tableaux, Op. 39 - Apassianato
19. Rachmaninoff Prelude No. 4 Op. 23
20. Major Jeremy Ng Prelude - E Flat Op. 23
22. Preludes, Book 2 - La puerta del Vin
23. In My Homeland
24. Drommesyn - Phantom

name: The Last Tree: Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The Last Tree classical music soundtrack.
